item.title: Bring Your Own Image
item.description: When I was working at OVHCloud company, I’ve developed a feature called BYOI (Bring Your Own Image). Bring Your Own Image technology allows you to boot any cloud (or not) images on a baremetal. Even if today not all editors are ready to provide completely agnostic images (and I mean UEFI ready and/or legacy boot), by triturating (packer) a bit the whole, we can have something functional. This mark the first step towards the Hybrid IAC.
